code: export function displayTweets(callback){var xhr=new XMLHttpRequest();var method="GET";var url="http://localhost:8000/api/tweets/";var responseType="json";xhr.responseType=responseType;xhr.open(method,url);xhr.onload=function(){callback(xhr.response,xhr.status);};xhr.onerror=function(){alert("Sorry, a serious error occured");};xhr.send();}
